Package io.github.goldmensch

Class Localization

java.lang.Object
io.github.goldmensch.Localization
public final class Localization extends Object
Contains all localizations to the corresponding Locale
A Localization is fully thread safe and immutable

    • create

      public static Localization create​(@NotNull @NotNull Locale locale, @NotNull @NotNull Map<String,​String> localizations)
      Creates a new Localization containing the localizations from the Map
      Parameters:
      locale - The Locale which should belong to the Localization
      localizations - A Map which contains the localizations
      Returns:
      A Localizer which contains the localizations from the map

    • fromResourceBundle

      public static Localization fromResourceBundle​(@NotNull @NotNull ResourceBundle bundle)

      Creates a new Localization from a ResourceBundle

      The Locale is taken from the ResourceBundle

      Parameters:
      bundle - The ResourceBundle containing the localizations
      Returns:
      A localizer which contains the localization from the ResourceBundle

    • getLocalization

      public Optional<String> getLocalization​(@NotNull @NotNull String key)
      Gets a localization with the given key
      Parameters:
      key - The key of the localization
      Returns:
      A Optional containing the localizations, or if no localization was found, an empty Optional
